description: End users may experience an unexpected ability to bypass digital signatures on their systems. This observable behavior indicates a critical security feature bypass in the Windows Cryptographic Services related to CVE-2024-30098. Impacted builds include Windows 10 versions 21H2 and 22H2 as well as Windows 11 versions 21H2, 22H2, and 23H2. Relevant knowledge base articles for reference are KB5040442, KB5040431, and KB5040427. The severity of this issue is deemed important, emphasizing the necessity for immediate attention to resolve potential security risks in affected systems.
